channel.title: How do you link your SoundCloud on your account?
channel.description:
I noticed the other day that people can link their SoundCloud to their profile hear and I have no clue how to do so.
If someone could tell me it would be very much appreciated.

item.title: How do you link your SoundCloud on your account?

item.title: How do you link your SoundCloud on your account?
item.dc:creator: L1me
item.description:
Click ur profile in the top right corner, hit the button on the vey right, push preference, then click profile and copy paste ur sc there

Read full topic
